dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset contains 70,000 real-world handwritten images with digits from 0 to 9. It is used to evaluate different methods by learning a global model on these training images distributed on multiple devices in a non-IID setting with adversarial attacks.
dcterms:title: MNIST dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10 dataset contains 60,000 natural images in ten object classes. The experimental setup is also non-IID on CIFAR-10.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10 dataset

dcterms:creator: Ruining H.
Julian M.
dcterms:description: The Amazon Reviews dataset contains product reviews and ratings collected from the Amazon website. Every review is paired with a sentiment rating from 1 to 5. The dataset is used for training a binary classifier on book reviews from the Kindle Store.
dcterms:title: Amazon Reviews dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Kan
dcterms:description: The Lending Club Loan dataset contains financial information such as credit scores and the number of finance inquiries for loan status prediction. It includes 1,808,534 data samples in 9 types of loan status.
dcterms:title: Lending Club Loan dataset
